mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cust_valid_multi_val_d (valid_code, attr_uuid, attr_seq, attr_val, rgst_user, rgst_dtm, upd_user, upd_dtm) VALUES (#{validCode}, #{attrUuid}, #{attrSeq}, #{attrVal}, #{rgstUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT t.attr_val FROM tb_cust_valid_multi_val_d t where t.valid_code = #{validCode} and t.attr_uuid = #{attrUuid}
